title: STAT+: Could AI help doctors catch signs of cognitive decline early?
description: Researchers showed that an AI tool can scan clinical notes to flag patients at risk of clinical decline so doctors follow up.
content: Researchers showed that an AI tool can scan clinical notes to flag patients at risk of clinical decline so doctors follow up.
